title: Crypto expert weighs Dogecoin’s potential role in reviving mainstream interest in crypto
description: Amidst the ongoing bull market in the cryptocurrency sphere, Scott Melker, renowned in the crypto community as the ‘Wolf of All Streets,’ has put forth an intriguing theory regarding the resurgence of mainstream demand for digital assets. Melker, a seasoned crypto expert, has postulated that the revival of genuine interest from non-crypto natives hinges significantly […]

title: Bitcoin’s bullish backer MicroStrategy surpasses Amazon in trading volume
description: MicroStrategy, a firm renowned for its significant Bitcoin holdings, has surpassed Amazon in trading volume. According to Eric Balchunas, Senior ETF Analyst at Bloomberg, MicroStrategy’s trading volume hit an unprecedented $8 billion, eclipsing that of the e-commerce behemoth. This surge follows closely on the heels of MicroStrategy’s announcement regarding a $525 million convertible debt offering. […]

title: Celestia (TIA) And SUI Holders Grow Impatient As Data Shows New Buyers Enter NuggetRush Presale – Can They Finally Make Gains?
description: Celestia’s recent DeFi partnerships could spur a TIA recovery. Sui is also struggling with a decline despite the widespread bullishness. NuggetRush’s (NUGX) presale has now raised over $3 million. Celestia has fallen from its January highs, recording a price stagnation despite the current market bullishness. Sui has also fallen sharply. NuggetRush has now sold 222 [...]

title: Solana Meme Coin BOME Makes Explosive Debut on Binance Amid 1,198% Gain
description:
The most prominent crypto trading platform, Binance, has announced plans to list the fast-growing Solana-based meme coin BOOK OF MEME (BOME) amid recent explosive rallies. Binance communicated this move via its official website early today, noting the BOME token will be welcomed in the Binance Futures Market. In particular, Binance will launch a USD margin […]
